answers.answer: My baby was 6lbs 9oz at 34 which they said was pretty big so im getting checked again tomorrow, ill b 38 wks. Hopefully she has slowed down some or else i.might have to be induced or have c section..let me know how it goes!

question: Have last ultrasound today at 9:30...I was wondering how much your babies weighed at 36 weeks?
title: how much did your baby weigh @ 36 weeks?
